description: Symbolic processing, symbolic reasoning, and pattern matching for consciousness state representation
purpose: Provides symbolic logic processing, pattern matching capabilities, and symbolic reasoning for representing and manipulating consciousness states

capabilities.name: symbolic_processing
capabilities.description: Process symbolic representations of concepts, states, and relationships

capabilities.name: symbolic_reasoning
capabilities.description: Reason using symbolic logic, rules, and inference engines

capabilities.name: pattern_matching
capabilities.description: Match symbolic patterns with efficient algorithms and backtracking

quality_guarantees.input_validation: All symbolic expressions are validated for syntax and semantics
quality_guarantees.error_handling: Parse errors and unification failures handled gracefully
quality_guarantees.type_safety: Full type annotations with symbolic-specific types
quality_guarantees.thread_safety: Immutable symbol tables ensure thread safety
